name: Wolverine
keywords: Jean Grey School For Higher Learning

special_powers.name: NEW SCHOOL
special_powers.description: When Wolverine is hit, once per turn, modify defense +1 on all friendly characters with the Jean Grey School for Higher Learning keyword this turn.

special_powers.name: BERSERKER TENDENCIES
special_powers.description: Charge, Flurry.

special_powers.name: CONCUSSIVE BLOW
special_powers.description: Force Blast. Cyclops may knock back characters that can use Charge or Combat Reflexes.

special_powers.name: EXTINCTION TEAM
special_powers.description: When Cyclops hits, once per turn, modify attack +1 on all friendly characters with the Utopia keyword this turn.

special_powers.name: EXTINCTION TEAM
special_powers.description: When Storm hits, one per turn, modify attack +1 on all friendly characters with the Utopia keyword this turn.

special_powers.name: STORMY NIGHT
special_powers.description: Storm and adjacent friendly characters (that share a keyword with her) can use Energy Shield/Deflection.

special_powers.name: EXTINCTION TEAM
special_powers.description: When Emma Frost hits, once per turn, modify attack +1 on all friendly characters with the Utopia keyword this turn.

special_powers.name: OH HONEY...I DON'T NEED MY MIND TO MANIPULATE MEN
special_powers.description: If an opposing character begins its move within 4 squares of Emma Frost, they can only move in a direct path that movement.

special_powers.name: EXTINCTION TEAM
special_powers.description: When Magneto hits, once per turn, modify attack +1 on all friendly characters with the Utopia keyword this turn.

special_powers.name: BRILLIANT LEADER
special_powers.description: Leadership. Outwit -or- Perplex.

name: Cannonball
keywords: Jean Grey School For Higher Learning

special_powers.name: NEW SCHOOL
special_powers.description: When Cannonball is hit, once per turn, modify defense +1 on all friendly characters with the Jean Gray School for Higher Learning keyword this turn.

special_powers.name: BLASTING OFF
special_powers.description: Charge, Force Blast. Force Blast as FREE. // When an opposing character knocked back by Cannonball has its knockback path stopped due to blocking terrain, the edge of the map, or higher/lower elevation, after resolutions remove an action token from Cannonball.

special_powers.name: EXTINCTION TEAM
special_powers.description: When Magik hits, once per turn, modify attack +1 on all friendly characters with the Utopia keyword this turn.

special_powers.name: STEPPING DISCS
special_powers.description: Phasing/Teleport. PASSENGER: 2.

name: Warbird
keywords: Jean Grey School For Higher Learning

special_powers.name: NEW SCHOOL
special_powers.description: When Warbird is hit, once per turn, modify defense +1 on all friendly characters with he Jean Grey School For Higher Learning keyword this turn.

special_powers.name: EXTINCTION TEAM
special_powers.description: When Psylocke hits, once per turn, modify attack +1 on all friendly characters with the Utopia keyword this turn.

special_powers.name: PSYCHIC SUGGESTION
special_powers.description: Opposing characters using Sidestep may only move in a direct path.

special_powers.name: PSYCHIC KNIFE
special_powers.description: Precision Strike. When Psylocke hits with a close attack, after resolutions give a hit character an action token.

name: Kitty Pryde
keywords: Jean Grey School For Higher Learning

special_powers.name: NEW SCHOOL
special_powers.description: When Kitty Pryde is hit, once per turn modify defense +1 on all friendly characters with the Jean Grey School For Higher Learning keyword this turn.

name: Beast
keywords: Jean Grey School For Higher Learning

special_powers.name: NEW SCHOOL
special_powers.description: When Beast is hit, once per turn modify defense +1 on all friendly characters with the Jean Grey School For Higher Learning keyword this turn.

name: Gambit
keywords: Jean Grey School For Higher Learning

special_powers.name: NEW SCHOOL
special_powers.description: When Gambit is hit, once per turn modify defense +1 on all friendly characters with the Jean Grey School For Higher Learning keyword this turn.

special_powers.name: DOUBLE OR NOTHIN'
special_powers.description: Probability Control, but only to target friendly characters. If the final result of an attack rerolled by Gambit is doubles, remove an action token from Gambit.

name: Rachel Summers
keywords: Jean Grey School For Higher Learning

special_powers.name: NEW SCHOOL
special_powers.description: When Rachel Summers is hit, once per turn modify defense +1 on all friendly characters with the Jean Grey School For Higher Learning keyword this turn.

special_powers.name: MIND BLAST
special_powers.description: When Rachel Summers hits with a range attack, after resolutions hit characters gain Immobile until your next turn.

special_powers.name: EXTINCTION TEAM
special_powers.description: When Namor hits, once per turn modify attack +1 on all friendly characters with the Utopia keyword this turn.

special_powers.name: WATCH THE ARROGANT PRIDE, NAMOR
special_powers.description: Namor can't be the target of an attack with more than one target. Opposing characters that didn't begin their turn within 3 squares of Namor can't target him that turn.

name: Rogue
keywords: Jean Grey School For Higher Learning

special_powers.name: NEW SCHOOL
special_powers.description: When Rogue is hit, once per turn modify defense +1 on all friendly characters with the Jean Grey School For Higher Learning keyword this turn.

special_powers.name: POWER ABSORPTION
special_powers.description: Steal Energy.

special_powers.name: EXTINCTION TEAM
special_powers.description: When Colossus hits, once per turn modify attack +1 on all friendly characters with the Utopia keyword this turn.

special_powers.name: THROW THROUGH THE WALL
special_powers.description: KNOCKBACK. When Colossus knocks back a character, he can choose the direction of knock back and this knock back path isn't stopped by walls. Immediately after resolutions, destroy any walls that knock back path passed through and deal the character 1 penetrating damage for each wall destroyed this way.

name: Iceman
keywords: Jean Grey School For Higher Learning

special_powers.name: NEW SCHOOL
special_powers.description: When Iceman is hit, once per turn modify defense +1 on all friendly characters with the Jean Grey School For Higher Learning keyword this turn.

special_powers.name: STUCK IN THE ICE
special_powers.description: Plasticity. Adjacent opposing characters can't use [Improved Movement: Characters] or [Improved Movement: This character can move through squares adjacent to or occupied by opposing characters without stopping. (Still needs to break away.)]. (They can't use them as soon as they move adjacent to Iceman.)

special_powers.name: COLD TO THE TOUCH
special_powers.description: Incapacitate, Poison. When Iceman uses Poison, instead of dealing damage to a character he may give that character an action token.

special_powers.name: EXTINCTION TEAM
special_powers.description: When Hope Summers hits, once per turn modify attack +1 on all friendly characters with the Utopia keyword this turn.

special_powers.name: POWER MIMICRY
special_powers.description: FREE: Choose a standard friendly character within 4 squares and line of fire and 2 standard powers that character can use. Until your next turn, Hope Summers can use those powers.

name: Angel
keywords: Jean Grey School For Higher Learning

special_powers.name: NEW SCHOOL
special_powers.description: When Angel is hit, once per turn modify defense +1 on all friendly characters with the Jean Grey School For Higher Learning keyword this turn.

special_powers.name: EXTINCTION TEAM
special_powers.description: When Danger hits, once per turn modify attack +1 on all friendly characters with the Utopia keyword this turn.

special_powers.name: TRUE ADAPTABILITY
special_powers.description: Outwit, Perplex, Shape Change.
